resources.string:
What is RMS? 
 A software that translates RSA codes into human-readable text.

 
 How does this program fundamentally work?
 Messages are encrypted with public key and decrypted by the recipient using a private key. 
 
 In this program, you need to add the public key of the person you want to send a message to, choose a name for the key, and when you want to send a message, enter the name of the recipients public key. 
 "You can scan the Qrcode of the public key and easily have the other partys key. Please note that this is a public key, and sharing it does not cause any issues." 


 
 Is it possible for the password to be hacked? 
 Yes, but the time required for this is more than a few months. 

With quantum computers, of which only a few exist, these types of codes can be obtained in less than a few minutes.
